items.sentence: Just tell Tom he\'ll have to wait another day.
Leave me alone or I\'m going to call security.
I thought you said you wanted to learn French.
Tom was a real heartbreaker when he was young.
Tom was just happy to have someone to talk to.
I plan to stay in bed all day and read a book.
Tom apparently wants to go to Boston with you.
Tom thinks that Mary can\'t understand French.
Why would you want to buy something like that?
Would you buy one if it were a little cheaper?
